metadata.name: Epiphany I
metadata.description:
Epiphany, par one. 

A silent video triptych describing a moment of light, coming suddenly in a moment of despair, like icy water on a dry skin. 

The triptych has been created with a extract of the 1962 american independent horror film Carnival of Souls, produced and directed by Herk Harvey, written by John Clifford and starring the magnificent performance of Candace Hilligoss.
